about.summary: TinyDB is a tiny, document oriented database optimized for your happiness :)

name: tinydb
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "3.2.0" %}

package:
    name: tinydb
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    url: https://github.com/msiemens/tinydb/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
    fn: tinydb-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 434062a7ec7cc385f8f43f49820acf6ed423fcea1d354caf0abf548bddf5ca6e

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - setuptools
        - python
    run:
        - python

test:
    imports:
        - tinydb
    requires:
        - pytest
    commands:
        - py.test {{ environ.SRC_DIR }}/tests -vrsx

about:
    home: https://github.com/msiemens/tinydb
    license: MIT
    summary: >
        TinyDB is a tiny, document oriented database optimized for your 
        happiness :)

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ericdill
        - licode
        - msiemens
        - tacaswell
